title: Rock Star Protector: An Instalove Romance
description: He’s not your typical bodyguard. And I’m not your typical Rock Star. Sometimes I hate being famous… …especially when my psycho, mafia, ex-boyfriend is after me. What do you do in that situation? Hire Liam Cannon The biggest. Meanest. And the best looking bodyguard I’ve ever seen. 1) Ex Navy Seal 2) A raw, beast of a man 3) And brutally protective of me. Otherwise known as… Just my type. He makes my heart pound louder than a drum set. But things are going from bad to worse… My psycho ex will stop at nothing to get his hands on me. But I know Liam will keep me safe in his arms He has too My life depends on it… This action-packed, instalove romance features an over-the-top alpha who will do anything to protect the one he loves. No Cliffhangers. No Cheating. This is a standalone romance novella with an HEA ending. If you like your heroes tough and brutally protective, you won’t be disappointed.
author: M. West
